nodes.text: Terion Drel was as a Human native of the planet Zakuul who was exiled for questioning Emperor Arcann's rule over the Eternal Empire.

Terion Drel will send players a message if they invite the Zakuulan exiles to join their crew in Chapter IV: The Gravestone in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. If they choose not to, the player will receive a message about how Arcann's forces captured all of the exiles.
